name: Solenars Edge Heroes
description: Answer the call and fight! Choose your side-kick and form a team from over 60 playable characters as you fight to become the greatest Hero in all of Alcornagia.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz  Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 video resolution Storage: 850 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 8.1 / 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon XP Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 video resolution Storage: 850 MB available space Sound Card: Any
